body.p:
Covington Oct 21 1861
Hon Gov B Magoffin
Dr Sir

Mr G. W Tompson has been fined for selling or giving my negro man spirits I will say to you that my negro man is in the habbit by my permission to do little Jobs for which he gets pay and Mr T -- hired him to scrub out his shop and gave him a drink of beer. I do not think he T intended to break the law and therefore think his fine should be remitted

Very Respectfull
Your obedt Servnt
C V Blackburn
